sentences.sContent: The society publishes a newsletter twice a year.
sentences.sCn: 该社团一年出版两次简报。

remMethod.val: news(消息， 新闻) + letter(文字) → 时事通讯

trans.tranCn: 时事通讯， 业务通讯
trans.tranOther: a short written report of news about a club, organization etc that is sent regularly to people who are interested
